name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters GX: Tag Force 2
name_original: Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters GX: Tag Force 2
description: A new year at the Duel Academy has begun and the Tag Duel Tournament is the year’s most anticipated event. Champion duelists from all around the world have accepted invitations to this tournament. Explore the Duel Academy and find your perfect partner to combine your decks to become an unstoppable fighting machine! With Yu-Gi-Oh! GX Tag Force 2, you can now duel 2 vs 2 with your friends! An enhanced Tag Duel system allows up to four friends to play all at once. Tons of new characters have been added, including ASter and Jesse — who will be your partner? With the new Destiny Draw system, it’s not over until the last draw!
